Name: Final Evolution 2
Desc: Devour Black: Every <color=#34aff9>10s</color>, Voodoo creates a doll with an aura close to the character. When being inside the aura for <color=#34aff9>6s</color>, the doll will be wrecked and continuously shoot lightning bolts at the character.
TeachingContents[3]: text: <color=#34aff9>The Lightning Dolls</color> will copy the appearances of your characters and appear next to you, as shown below.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Power of Horn</size></color>
Desc: While Super Armor is active, Ox gains more Resistance.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Polar Ram</size></color>
Desc: Upon impact, Ox's Dash Attack will drag the player to its destination. When it expires, additionally inflicts a 40% Slow Down for 2.5s.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Reversed Shockwave</size></color>
Desc: All attacks by Ox send shockwaves, and all shockwaves travel back. While Berserk is active, Ox sends even more shockwaves.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>The Mighty Ox!</size></color>
Desc: There are two Oxen on the field at the same time.

Name: Strong Ox
Desc: While Super Armor is active, Ox has more Resistance.

Name: Blinking Mine
Desc: There are <color=#34aff9>Blinking Mines</color> on the field. <color=#34aff9>Matching 3-Pings</color> next to a Mine will activate the Mine.
TeachingContents[1]: text: <color=#34aff9>Blinking Mine</color>: <color=#34aff9>Enemies</color> who are caught within the range of a Blinking Mine will be <color=#34aff9>directly stunned</color> and knocked down.

Name: Dragon Breath Device
Desc: There are <color=#34aff9>Dragon Breath Devices</color> on the field. <color=#34aff9>Matching 3-Pings</color> next to such a device will activate it.
TeachingContents[1]: text: <color=#34aff9>Dragon Breath Device</color>: Summons dragon breaths to attack <color=#34aff9>enemies</color>, significantly <color=#34aff9>reducing their Super Armor</color> and <color=#34aff9>increasing their damage taken</color>.

Name: Strength of Ox
Desc: While <color=#FF0000>Super Armor is active, Ox has significantly more DEF</color>. Also, at less than 60% HP, Ox goes <color=#FF0000>Berserk</color>.
TeachingContents[1]: text: <color=#FF0000>Berserk</color>: Its attacks <color=#FF0000>send shockwaves</color> and it <color=#FF0000>cannot be knocked down</color>. Also, it <color=#FF0000>ignores Matrix</color>, but <color=#34aff9>significantly loses all DEFs.</color>

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Refinement - Crit</size></color>
Desc: Activating any device will grant 30% CRIT Rate to the players within range for 10s.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Refinement - Heal</size></color>
Desc: Activating any device restores 5% HP to nearby allies per second for 10s.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Refinement - CD</size></color>
Desc: When all devices are activated, the cooldown is reduced from 60s to 40s.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Polarized Defense</size></color>
Desc: In its initial form, the Dragon has significantly more Resistance. After turning into the Element Dragon, the Resistance against its associated stat will further increase, but the Resistance against its opposite stat will reduce.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Final Judgment</size></color>
Desc: The Dragon's Ultimate, Final Judgment, deals significantly more damage.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Elemental Corruption</size></color>
Desc: When the Dragon deals stat damage to the player, inflicts special debuffs based on what that stat is.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Berserk Dragon</size></color>
Desc: The Dragon never stops with its endless attacks.

Name: Elemental Drain
Desc: The Dragon starts in its <color=#34aff9>Normal Form</color>, but it keeps absorbing the Elemental DMG dealt by players. At less than 80% HP, it transforms.
TeachingContents[1]: text: <color=#34aff9>Normal Form</color>: The Dragon has <color=#34aff9>higher Physical Resistance</color> but <color=#34aff9>lower Elemental Resistance.</color>

Name: Elemental Incarnate
Desc: When the Dragon transforms, <color=#FF0000>it transforms into the associated Elemental Dragon based on the most Elemental DMG it absorbs in its first phase</color>.
TeachingContents[1]: text: TIPS: If the Dragon <color=#34aff9>doesn't take any Elemental DMG before it transforms</color>, a random Element is chosen.

Name: Elemental Discharge
Desc: Once turned into an Elemental Dragon, Dragon's <color=#FF0000>attacks will inflict additional effects</color>, and different types of Elemental Dragon have <color=#34aff9>different Elemental Resistance</color>. For details, see the description on the right.
TeachingContents[1]: text: <color=#FF0000>Fire Dragon</color>: Attacks by the Dragon inflict <color=#FF0000>Delayed Fire</color>, <color=#FF0000>its Fire Resistance is increased</color>, and its <color=#34aff9>Dark Resistance is reduced</color>. When Elemental Corruption is active, attacks also inflict damage over time.
TeachingContents[3]: text: <color=#FF0000>Lightning Dragon</color>: Attacks by the Dragon inflict <color=#FF0000>Additional Lightning</color>, <color=#FF0000>its Lightning Resistance is increased</color>, and its <color=#34aff9>Ice Resistance is reduced</color>. When Elemental Corruption is active, attacks generate Delayed Lightning upon hitting an enemy.
TeachingContents[5]: text: <color=#FF0000>Ice Dragon</color>: Attacks by the Dragon inflict <color=#FF0000>Additional Ice Cones</color>, <color=#FF0000>its Ice Resistance is increased</color>, and its <color=#34aff9>Fire Resistance is reduced</color>. When Elemental Corruption is active, attacks slow enemies upon impact.
TeachingContents[7]: text: <color=#FF0000>Dark Dragon</color>: Attacks by the Dragon inflict <color=#FF0000>Additional Dark Explosions</color>, <color=#FF0000>its Dark Resistance is increased</color>, and its <color=#34aff9>Lightning Resistance is reduced</color>. When Elemental Corruption is active, attacks reduce an enemy's DEF upon impact.

Name: Final Judgment
Desc: At less than 30% HP, the Dragon casts its Ultimate <color=#FF0000>Final Judgment</color>. Its damage is significantly reduced for every <color=#34aff9>broken arm</color> the Elemental Dragon has.
TeachingContents[1]: text: <color=#FF0000>Final Judgment</color>: Deals massive damage to all characters one time. Then, deals damage to them over time.
TeachingContents[3]: text: <color=#34aff9>Break the Arm</color>: Destroying the Dragon's arm will <color=#34aff9>significantly reduce the damage dealt by Final Judgment</color>. Dealing damage associated with the opposite stat can <color=#34aff9>more easily break the Dragon's arm</color>.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Steel Module</size></color>
Desc: All characters have Super Armor permanently.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Shield Module</size></color>
Desc: Every 20s, gains a DMG Immunity Shield. When shattered, the timer restarts.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Spread Module</size></color>
Desc: Upon dealing Elemental DMG, there is a 10% chance to deal the same amount of damage to all parts of the Dragon again.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Stealth Bombardment</size></color>
Desc: Bombardment at the shield absorption stage <color=#34aff9>will not trigger Extreme Dodge</color>.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Energy Refine</size></color>
Desc: At the shield absorption stage, if no Glory Clones exist, <color=#34aff9>summons</color> a Glory Clone with <color=#34aff9>10%</color> HP of the original. Otherwise, sacrifices the Glory Clone to summon a stronger one.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Energy Max</size></color>
Desc: The shield absorption stage increases by <color=#34aff9>4%</color> every second.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Luminous Evolution</size></color>
Desc: When both sets of shields have been absorbed or dropped below 30% HP, enemies will enter <color=#34aff9>Phase II</color>.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Accel Time</size></color>
Desc: Moon Eater's arms charge <color=#34aff9>2%</color> faster every second.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Harden</size></color>
Desc: To cut off the enemy's arm, it requires attacks that are <color=#34aff9>different</color> from the last time. Attack Types: <color=#34aff9>Signal Orb skills, Basic Attack, and Signature</color>

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Assimilate</size></color>
Desc: When the enemy's arm is severed, the enemy's Resistance to <color=#34aff9>that attack's element</color> will increase until the next time its arm is severed.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Wrath</size></color>
Desc: When Moon Eater Phase II is in wrath, it will absorb all blood on the ground. Each puddle of blood <color=#34aff9>decreases all characters'</color> Max HP by <color=#34aff9>10%</color>.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Demon Bane's Might</size></color>
Desc: Demon Bane gains <color=#34aff9>Berserk</color>. Its aggressiveness and ATK become higher.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Heaven Breaker's Guard</size></color>
Desc: Heaven Breaker gains <color=#34aff9>Hesitant</color>. Its Finisher Gauge will recover if it is not attacked for 5s.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>God Slayer's Techniques</size></color>
Desc: God Slayer gains <color=#34aff9>Rigid Body</color>. All DMG received is reduced to 1. This effect is removed when it takes DMG 12 times and will resume in 8s.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Rematch</size></color>
Desc: The first enemy wave becomes MC Solar. When defeated, it will be repaired and call forth Demon Bane, Heaven Breaker, and God Slayer to fight together. Demon Bane, Heaven Breaker, and God Slayer will not attack for 20s after receiving Speed Attack.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Visual Enhancement</size></color>
Desc: Characters' CRIT Rates increase.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Drain Power</size></color>
Desc: Critical hits increase DMG by 5% for 6s. It can be stacked up to 5 times. Its duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Lunar Character I</size></color>
Desc: Lunar Enhancement 1

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Lunar Character II</size></color>
Desc: Lunar Enhancement 2

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Flexible Strategy</size></color>
Desc: Dodge Gauge recovers faster.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Heating Up</size></color>
Desc: Characters will be Invincible for 3s upon receiving DMG.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Operation Continues</size></color>
Desc: HP recovers every second for 10s after Speed Attack.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Withstand I</size></color>
Desc: Enemies' Finisher Gauges lose 10% less.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Withstand II</size></color>
Desc: Enemies' Finisher Gauges lose 20% less.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Withstand III</size></color>
Desc: Enemies' Finisher Gauges lose 30% less.

Name: Shield Absorption
Desc: When shields are present on the field, enemies will regularly <color=#34aff9>absorb</color> them. When they absorb a shield, they <color=#34aff9>do not move</color>.

Name: Mechanical Domination
Desc: When the enemy is absorbing a shield, it will control the Shield Generator to <color=#34aff9>fire at the characters</color>.

Name: Energy Boost
Desc: When the shield absorption rate reaches 100%, the shield will be destroyed. Enemies' <color=#34aff9>Fire and Lightning Resistance</color> increase by <color=#34aff9>30%</color> after absorbing the first set of shields, while their <color=#34aff9>Dark and Ice Resistance</color> increase by <color=#34aff9>30%</color> after absorbing the second set.

Name: Arm Augmentation
Desc: Moon Eater charges its arms continuously. When they are charged to <color=#34aff9>100%</color>, its attacks will inflict <color=#34aff9>additional effects</color>. Severing its arms will <color=#34aff9>empty the charge progress</color>.

Name: Dynamic Calibration
Desc: Moon Eater Phase I has the <color=#34aff9>"Dynamic Calibration"</color> effect that will continuously restore its HP. This effect is removed when its leg is severed for the first time.

Name: Resect
Desc: When Moon Eater's Super Armor is <color=#34aff9>emptied</color> in Phase I, receiving attacks again will <color=#34aff9>reset</color> Matrix cooldown and launch a counterattack. Dodging this counterattack with Matrix and <color=#34aff9>attacking it again</color> before Matrix ends will sever its limb.
TeachingContents[4]: text: After emptying Super Armor, <color=#34aff9>front attacks</color> will lure the enemy into using a counterattack that can have its <color=#34aff9>arm</color> severed, while <color=#34aff9>back attacks</color> will lure it into using a counterattack that can have its <color=#34aff9>leg</color> severed.

Name: Residuals
Desc: The enemy will leave corrosive blood in place when its limb is severed, dealing continuous <color=#34aff9>DMG</color> to characters in contact with it.

Name: Four Great Powers
Desc: God Slayer, Demon Bane, Heaven Breaker, and MC Solar will appear one after the other. Defeat them all to clear this stage.

Name: Decision
Desc: After Moon Eater's Super Armor is emptied in Phase I, <color=#34aff9>front attacks</color> will lure the enemy into using a counterattack that can have its <color=#34aff9>arm</color> severed, while <color=#34aff9>back attacks</color> will lure it into using a counterattack that can have its <color=#34aff9>leg</color> severed.
TeachingContents[3]: text: After emptying Super Armor, <color=#34aff9>front attacks</color> will lure the enemy into using a counterattack that can have its <color=#34aff9>arm</color> severed, while <color=#34aff9>back attacks</color> will lure it into using a counterattack that can have its <color=#34aff9>leg</color> severed.

Name: Evolution
Desc: When Moon Eater's Super Armor is emptied in Phase II, attacking it in Matrix will sever its arm. Only 1 arm can be severed at a time.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Infection Spreading</size></color>
Desc: The Corrupted will explode after being defeated.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Elimination of Anomalies</size></color>
Desc: There will also be a "Data" Jaspers at the beginning of the battle, who will also attack the commandant.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Burning Method</size></color>
Desc: Jaspers gains "Radiation". His attacks will make Commandant Burn and lose HP over a certain period.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Beyond Evolution</size></color>
Desc: Jaspers will not be affected by the Matrix. When "Jaspers'" HP drops below 50%, another "Jaspers" will appear and attack Commandant.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Bravery</size></color>
Desc: Gain 2 sets of Signal Orbs after performing a Uniframe's Finishing Move.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Power Capture</size></color>
Desc: Character deals more Extra DMG and becomes Invincible for 10s after performing the Uniframe's Finishing Move.

Name: <color=#78db64><size=34>Life Drain</size></color>
Desc: Character restore 15% of Max HP after performing the Uniframe's Finishing Move.

Name: Data Collection
Desc: There will be <color=#34aff9>five Corrupted</color> in the battlefield at the beginning of the battle. Jaspers will collect their battle experiment data in the background and enter the battlefield as an evolved version before the countdown ends.
TeachingContents[1]: text: Uniframes' <color=#34aff9>Finishing Move</color> can stop Jaspers' evolution.

Name: Evolution Complete
Desc: Jaspers enters the battlefield and gains buffs based on <color=#FF0000>the number of Corrupted who survived the Uniframe's Finishing Move</color>. There will also be other Corrupted to assist him.
TeachingContents[1]: text: TIPS: The Corrupted who enter the battlefield with Jaspers will provide buffs to him and will immediately revive after being knocked down.

Name: Sample Leakage
Desc: After Jaspers' HP drops below a certain level, <color=#FF0000>two extra Corrupted will join the battle</color> and provide buffs for him.
TeachingContents[1]: text: Attack Jaspers first. And the victory is yours once Jaspers is down.

Name: FArmor
Desc: Only high Crit frames can break through its armor. (Gains increased DMG Reduction from Tank Omniframes)

Name: FRes-
Desc: The external tubing has stored a lot of organic composite pigments. Highly flammable and prone to explode. (Reduces Fire Resistance.)

Name: IRes+
Desc: Its body is made with a special metal for storing new types of pigments. Performs well in low temperatures and not easily corroded. (Increases Ice Resistance.)

Name: PRes-
Desc: An old model made with old experimental frame materials. Its tenacity and attack resistance are average. (Reduces Physical Resistance.)

Name: DRes+
Desc: A machine deeply corrupted by the Punishing Virus. It has high dark energy resistance. (Increases Dark Resistance.)

Name: LRes-
Desc: Vassago, a mechanoid serpent that strikes with precision and conceals itself in the sand by using strong electric currents. (Reduces Lightning Resistance.)

Name: FRes+
Desc: Vassago hides in the sand, away from all that is flammable. (Increases Fire Resistance.)

Name: IRes-
Desc: An AI mechanoid designed to imitate humans, its low cold resistance is its weakness. (Reduces Ice Resistance.)

Name: LRes+
Desc: An AI mechanoid designed to imitate humans, its high level bioelectric signal simulation makes it resistant to electric threats. (Increases Lightning Resistance.)

Name: DRes-
Desc: The damage on its Inver-Device renders its consciousness unstable and prone to corruption. (Reduces Dark Resistance.)

Name: Pres+
Desc: Tifa's sturdy outer armor protects her from a certain degree of Physical DMG. (Increases Physical Resistance.)

Name: DRes-
Desc: Its unstable consciousness signal makes it prone to corruption. (Reduces Dark Resistance.)

Name: IRes-
Desc: Huaxu's power output relies on a persistent high-temperature environment. The inability to withstand low temperatures is her fatal weakness. (Ice Resistance reduced)

Name: Pres+
Desc: Huaxu has activated her defense protocol that greatly enhances her resistance to physical attacks. (Physical Resistance increased)

Name: Astraphobia
Desc: Gabriel is vulnerable to electric shocks as many of his wires are exposed. Electric attacks can deal more damage to him. (Lightning Resistance reduced)

Name: Fire Proof
Desc: Fire cannot keep burning on Gabriel because of his delicate body structure and flame retardant power cables. (Fire Resistance boosted)

Name: Frail
Desc: Cannot resist physical impacts after the structure is weakened. Physical DMG received is increased significantly.

Name: Combustible
Desc: Easily ignited by high temperatures and causes huge explosions. Fire DMG received is increased significantly.

Name: Frost
Desc: The phenomenon of freezing expansion will occur at low temperatures. Ice DMG received is increased significantly.

Name: Electrode
Desc: Electric shocks will overload the circuits and thus cause paralysis. Lightning DMG received is increased significantly.

Name: Corrosion
Desc: The internal structure has been corroded by excessively stored radiant energy. Dark DMG received is increased significantly.

Name: Play Cute
Desc: Shark-speare thinks she is too strong for you. All she needs to do is play cute and go easy on you.

Name: Injured
Desc: Due to past experience and the demand for camouflage, Lamia's defense ability is also her fatal flaw. While camouflaged, Lamia will take increased DMG from Basic Attacks and Signature Moves.

Name: Silence
Desc: 3-Ping Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and based on this feature, increase all DMG taken by 15% every after Hamlet receives a 3-Ping Skill Attack. Stacks up to 8 times.

Name: Super Cute
Desc: Shark-speare is SUPER cute!

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Power</size></color>
Desc: α will show off her new "Power".

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>The True Power</size></color>
Desc: α will unleash her "ultimate Power" at the critical moment.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Precise Planning - β</size></color>
Desc: Switch cooldown increases by 2s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Precise Planning - β</size></color>
Desc: Switch cooldown increases by 5s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Precise Planning - β</size></color>
Desc: Switch cooldown increases by 10s.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Soul Meltdown I</size></color>
Desc: Your Constructs have a higher chance to be controlled by the threads when attacked.

Name: <color=#CF0000><size=34>Soul Meltdown II</size></color>
Desc: Your Constructs have a greatly higher chance to be controlled by the threads when attacked.

Name: The True Power
Desc: α will cast the <color=#FF0000>new battle skill</color> based on the selected Affix. Get ready for the <color=#FF0000>new power</color> from α!
TeachingContents[1]: text: When α's HP drops to 80% and 40% respectively, she will further awaken the power inside her.

Name: Soul Pull
Desc: When attacked by Madorea, your Constructs have a chance to be <color=#FF0000>pulled by threads</color>. Madorea will <color=#FF0000>control your Constructs</color> when they <color=#FF0000>have 3 threads on them</color>.

Name: Pull Break
Desc: After controlling your Constructs, Madorea will <color=#34aff9>spend Control Energy</color> and <color=#FF0000>cast Puppet Skills</color> to attack Commandant. When the Control Energy is used up, your Constructs will be <color=#34aff9>back under your control</color>.
TeachingContents[1]: text: <color=#34aff9>Attack Madorea's back</color> in the Matrix to <color=#34aff9>weaken her Control Energy</color>.

Name: Bloodlust
Desc: Enemies gain 15% more DMG for every 20% HP lost.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Shield I</size></color>
Desc: In every 10s, enemies will gain a shield equal to 5% of their current HP (they will immediately get one such shield when they spawn).

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Shield II</size></color>
Desc: In every 10s, enemies will gain a shield equal to 10% of their current HP (they will immediately get one such shield when they spawn).

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Shield III</size></color>
Desc: In every 10s, enemies will gain a shield equal to 15% of their current HP (they will immediately get one such shield when they spawn).

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Closed Loop</size></color>
Desc: Enemies' Extra DMG Reduction increases by 30% when taking DMG farther than 4m

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Closed Loop II</size></color>
Desc: Enemies' Extra DMG Reduction increases by 45% when taking DMG from more than 4m away.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Closed Loop III</size></color>
Desc: Enemies' Extra DMG Reduction increases by 60% when taking DMG from more than 4m away.

Name: Reboot Prohibited
Desc: Due to Madorea's interference, you <color=#FF0000>cannot restart or revive</color> in this stage.
